unpublishedAction.name: Api2

headers.value: {{    ( () => {        var accessKey = this.params.accessKey || appsmith.store.accessKey;        var secretKey = this.params.secretKey || appsmith.store.secretKey;        var api = this.params.api || '/wazirx-falcon/admin/v1.0/kyc_dashboard/kyc_age_data';   var duration = this.params.duration || '0-1';                    var queryParams = "duration="+duration;        var method = this.params.method || 'GET';        console.log("Signature queryParams", queryParams, "test");        var tonce = this.params.tonce || tonce_input.text;        console.log("Signature tonce", tonce);        var payload =            method +            "|access-key=" +            accessKey +            "&tonce=" +            tonce +            "|" +            api +            "|" +             queryParams;        console.log("Signature payload", payload);        var hmac = forge.hmac.create();        console.log("Signature hmac");        hmac.start("sha256", secretKey);        hmac.update(payload);        var signature = hmac.digest().toHex();        console.log("signature", signature);        return signature;    })();}}
